title: Premier League total broadcasting payments to clubs 2010 to 2019
summary: The statistic illustrates the Broadcasting of payments million owned by households in the broadcasting from 2010/11 to 2018/19 .
In 2018/19 , about 2456.01 million payments were owned by American households .
Thus , payments million made up the most popular pet category in the broadcasting , based on the total Broadcasting .
gold: The statistic depicts the broadcasting payments to Premier League clubs from 2010/11 to 2018/19 . In the 2018/19 season , all Premier League clubs combined received a total of 2.46 billion British Pounds in broadcasting payments .
